subsection.title: Create new template using existing projects
subsection.note: Only Mingle or project administrator can create new templates.
subsection.p: You can create a new template from existing projects. This allows users to create templates that fit their project structure the best.

item.p: Click on the 'New template' link from manage templates page. This will take you to the 'Create a new template' page.

The 'Create a new template' page will list all existing projects that are available to you. For every project there will be a link called 'Create template from this project'. Click on the link that corresponds to the project from which you want to create your template.
If you return to the manage templates page you can verify the template was successfully created from selected project.
